qas.question: Who led the founders of the Barcelona football club?
How much is club Barcelona worth?
What is the title of the Barcelona club song?

context: Founded in <a0_0>1899<a0_0/> by a group of Swiss, English and Catalan footballers led by <a1_0>Joan Gamper<a1_0/>, the club has become a symbol of Catalan culture and Catalanism, hence the motto "<a2_0>Més que un club<a2_0/>" (More than a club). Unlike many other football clubs, the supporters own and operate Barcelona. It is the second most valuable sports team in the world, worth <a3_0>$3.16 billion<a3_0/>, and the world's second richest football club in terms of revenue, with an annual turnover of €560.8 million. The official Barcelona anthem is the <a4_0>"Cant del Barça"<a4_0/>, written by Jaume Picas and Josep Maria Espinàs.
